catentdesc.name: Hermitage Collection Rockport T-shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Deep V-neck t-shirt in silky rayon
catentdesc.longdescription: Chic and casual, this short sleeve t-shirt is great for a hot summer night on the town. The breathable fabric has a slight shimmer to reflect city lights.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Urban Shirt
catentdesc.longdescription: The sateen finish dresses up this classic shirt. Features a point collar, chest pocket, and button cuff. Available with long or short sleeves.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Peacemaker Plaid Shirt
catentdesc.longdescription: A casual, rugged look. This oversized plaid shirt is has long sleeves, button collar, and button cuffs. The angled plaid highlights the chest pockets.

catentdesc.name: Albini Anchor Shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Short sleeve shirt with nautical styling
catentdesc.longdescription: Navy snaps on the chest pockets and sleeves give this shirt a nautical look. Fitted for a slimming effect. Made of 100% cotton.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Harvard Dress Shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: A crisp, classic look with universal appeal
catentdesc.longdescription: This long sleeve dress shirt is the top of the class. Sharp and professional looking, this shirt wrinkle-free is perfect for travelling. Available with long or short sleeves.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Collection Rugged Plaid Shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Scarlet/navy plaid shirt with a single pocket
catentdesc.longdescription: Soft and comfortable, this easy-care long sleeve shirt from the Hermitage Collection will become a favorite. Features a back locker loop, and back box pleat for extra comfort.

catentdesc.name: Albini Roxbury Fitted Henley
catentdesc.shortdescription: Slim fitting ribbed t-shirt with V-snap collar
catentdesc.longdescription: If you have it, flaunt it in this finely ribbed henley from Albini. Made of 100% cotton and machine washable.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Tailored Dress Shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: An elegant, slim fitting shirt for the office
catentdesc.longdescription: Fitted for a slimmer silhouette, this dress shirt features a point collar and French placket. Available with long or short sleeves.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Indie Crewneck T-shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: A dressed up version of the classic crewneck
catentdesc.longdescription: A touch of silk softens the look and feel of this chic t-shirt. Perfect under a casual sport coat. Dry clean only.

catentdesc.name: Versatil V-neck Cotton T-shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Long sleeve fitted t-shirt with subtle ribbing
catentdesc.longdescription: Relax and look great in this casual V-neck shirt. Features soft wash cotton and contrast tape along inside of neck.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Cap Sleeve T-shirt
catentdesc.longdescription: The perfect t-shirt for the "jeans and a t-shirt" look. This slub knit t-shirt with cap sleeves will really show off your biceps.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Collection Faux Silk Shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Washable silky shirt with studded collar
catentdesc.longdescription: This dressy shirt has eye-catching metal detailing around the throat and collar. Made from a machine-washable polyester-rayon blend for easy care.

catentdesc.name: Albini Gull Dress Shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Fitted dress shirt with wing collar
catentdesc.longdescription: The chic extra-wide collar on this fitted dress shirt provides a unique style. Made from a worsted twill cotton weave that is wrinkle resistant. Machine-washable.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Fitted Denim Shirt
catentdesc.longdescription: The unique denim fabric in this shirt has a slight grid pattern for added style. Great with dark wash jeans or chinos.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Active V-neck T-shirt
catentdesc.longdescription: This moisture wicking t-shirt will keep you dry while you exercise. Wear as a bottom layer or alone. Breathable fabric.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Collection Stripe Shirt
catentdesc.longdescription: Look sharp in this! Thin vertical stripes in a single color brighten this classic shirt. Made from 100% wrinkle-resistant cotton -- no ironing required!

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Two-pocket Shirt
catentdesc.longdescription: Perfect weekend wear. This utility shirt has two buttoned chest pockets and a spread collar. Features soft wash cotton for extra comfort.
